title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for finding a(t)

1 point is earned for recognizing min at t=0

1 point is earned for evaluation

descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for finding a(t)

1 point is earned for recognizing min at t=0

1 point is earned for evaluation
